text: "Working Class Hero" is a 1970 song by John Lennon and taken from his 1970 album John Lennon/Plastic Ono Band. It is the A-side to his biggest hit Imagine. It has been covered by numerous artists including punk rock band Green Day. title: Working Class Hero
